channel.title: Making a new server
channel.description: Alright, after like 3 years everything about java is pretty much lost for me can someone asnwer how if the playerrights were NOT 3 the server would not let them in??

item.title: Making a new server

item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

Alright, after like 3 years everything about java is pretty much lost for me can someone asnwer how if the playerrights were NOT 3 the server would not let them in??
[/quote]

You don’t know Java yet you managed to get 173 rep? No, of course the reputation system isn’t abused

Anyway, do you basically want to only allow owners on your server?[/quote]
i know some stuff not all like i forgot certain things like making a server reject a connection because the ismember is lower then 2
